table.name: ob_accessorial
table.description: OB_ACCESSORIAL consists of the links to the ACCESSORIAL table to define the accessories required to fulfill the order. For example, a pump may be required to pump chemicals from a delivery truck. Accessorials are different from special services in that customers are charged for the accessories.

columns.name: ORDER_BASE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the order base.

columns.name: ACCESSORIAL_CODE_GID
columns.description: The accessorial code used to specify that this accessorial needs to be covered when planning the shipment.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
